definition: to appear on stage in an amateur capacity/(of a professional) to make a guest appearance/(fig.) to assume a role outside one's usual duties/to substitute for
customer/visitor/guest

to string together/to skewer/to connect wrongly/to gang up/to rove/string/bunch/skewer/classifier for things that are strung together, or in a bunch, or in a row: string of, bunch of, series of/to make a swift or abrupt linear movement (like a bead on an abacus)/to move across
special guest performer (in a show)/special guest appearance (in film credits)

sentences.english: Later she scored a few guest-starring roles.
sentences.chinese: 后来她又得到了一些客串的角色。

sentences.english: Love is like a play, your friendship, I have to show.
sentences.chinese: 爱情就像一场戏，你的友情客串，我却倾情演出。

sentences.english: No episode or date of his cameo are mentioned.
sentences.chinese: 大卫的客串将在哪一天哪一集播出尚而知。

sentences.english: Have fun watching a humorous cameo by comedian Gilbert Gottfried.
sentences.chinese: 乐趣观看喜剧演员吉尔伯特戈特弗里德幽默客串。

sentences.english: Would you be open to guest-starring on "The Vampire Diaries"?
sentences.chinese: 你会客串出演“吸血鬼日记吗”？

sentences.english: He guested on a television series.
sentences.chinese: 他客串了一个电视系列剧。

sentences.english: She made a guest appearance on his TV show.
sentences.chinese: 她在他的电视节目中出场客串。

sentences.english: Gillian Anderson and Cynthia Nixon guest star.
sentences.chinese: 吉莉安安德森和辛西娅尼克松客串。

sentences.english: Crosstalk comedian Guo Degang makes a cameo appearance in the movie.
sentences.chinese: 相声演员郭德纲也在片中客串了一个片段。

sentences.english: And has participated in TV and film guest, on-line with my video blog.
sentences.chinese: 并多次参加电视电影客串，网上有我的视频博客。

sentences.english: Schwarzenegger confirmed he would be making a cameo appearance in The Expendables.
sentences.chinese: 施瓦辛格确认他将会在《敢死队》中客串演出。

sentences.english: She is guesting on tonight's TV show.
sentences.chinese: 今晚她将在电视节目中客串演出。

sentences.english: Perry, who guest-starred this week on How I Met You Mother.
sentences.chinese: 佩里将会客串本周的《老爸老妈浪漫史》。

sentences.english: She is making her first guest appearance on the show.
sentences.chinese: 她在这场表演中作她的首次客串演出。

sentences.english: Renowned Chinese director, Chen Kaige has a cameo role in which western movie?
sentences.chinese: 知名导演陈凯歌曾在哪一部西方电影里客串演小兵？

sentences.english: Have cameos in" funny cartoon day and" in the S1 governess.
sentences.chinese: 曾经客串于《搞笑漫画日和》里的S1家庭女教师。

definition: supporting role (in play, film etc)/minor role/to play a secondary role (in business etc)/to play second fiddle
to play the role of/to act
role/character in a novel/persona/also pr. [jiao3 se4]
to cooperate/partner
to replace
to buy soy sauce/it's none of my business ("I’m just here to buy some soy sauce")
costume of minor characters in opera, featuring dragon designs/walk-on
to appear (in a show etc)/an appearance (on stage etc)
to play a small role
scene (in a movie etc)/one's part in a movie or play/(archaic) actor's payment
to play a leading role/to bear a heavy responsibility
an extra (in a movie)
(Tw) to take over sb's job/to substitute for
to develop/to evolve/to practice/to perform/to play/to act
stand-in/substitute/body double/stuntman/scapegoat/fall guy/to stand in for sb else
to play the leading role
